Translations.Text: emiti? Ataniki teliyada? Gorilalo unnadanta pellaginci bayatiki tiyabadinappudu
mariyu (manavula) hrdayalaloni visayalanni velladi ceyabadinappudu
niscayanga, a rojuna vari prabhuvu varini gurinci anta telusukoni untadani
a! Adaragotte maha upadravam
emita adaragotte maha upadravam
mariyu a adaragotte maha upadravam, ante emito nikem telusu
a roju manavulu cellaceduraina cim'metala vale ayipotaru
mariyu parvatalu rangu rangula ekina dudi vale ayi potayi
appudu evadi trasupallalu (satkaryalato) baruvuga untayo
atadu (svarganlo) sukhavantamaina jivitam gaduputadu
mariyu evadi (satkaryala) trasu pallalu telikaga untayo
atani nivasam adhah patalame
mariyu adi emito nikem telusu
adoka bhagabhagamande agni (gundam)
(ihaloka) perasa mim'malni emarupatulo padavesindi
miru gorilaloki cere varaku
ala kadu! Tvaralone miru telusu kuntaru
marokasari (vinandi)! Vastavanga, miru ati tvaralone telusukuntaru
enta matramu kadu! Okavela miru niscita jnananto telusukoni unte (mi vaikhari ila undedi kadu)
niscayanga, miru bhagabhaga mande narakagnini cudagalaru
malli antunnanu! Miru tappaka danini (narakagnini) nis'sankocamaina drstito cudagalaru
appudu, a roju miru (i jivitanlo anubhavincina) saukhyalanu gurinci tappaka prasnincabadataru
kalam saksiga
niscayanga manavudu nastanlo unnadu
kani visvasinci, satkaryalu cesevaru mariyu okarikokaru satyanni bodhincukune varu mariyu okarikokaru sahananni (sthairyanni) bodhincukune varu tappa
Apanindalu mope, cadilu ceppe prati okkadiki vinasam tappadu
evadaite dhananni kudabetti, mati matiki danni lekkabedutu untado
tana dhanam, tananu sasvatanga uncutundani atadu bhavistunnadu
enta matram kadu! Atadu (raboye jivitanlo) tappakunda anaga drokkabade narakagnilo veyabadatadu
a (anagadrokkabade) narakagni ante emito niku telusa
allah, tivranga prajvalimpajesina agni
adi gundela daka cerukuntundi
niscayanga, adi vari mida kram'mukontundi
podugati (agni) sthambhala vale
emi? Enuguvari (sain'yanto) ni prabhuvu ela vyavaharincado niku teliyada
emi? Ayana vari kutranu bhangam ceyaleda
mariyu ayana varipaiki paksula gumpulanu pampadu
avi (a paksulu) vari mida mattito cesi kalcina kankara rallanu (sijjil) visurutu poyayi
a vidhanga ayana varini (pasuvulu) tinivesina pottuga marci vesadu
(allah raksana mariyu ayana karunato) khuraisulu (prayanalaku) alavatu paddaru
(allah karuna mariyu ayana raksanato) varu sitakalapu mariyu vesavi kalapu prayanalu ceya galugutunnaru
kavuna varu a alaya (ka'abah) prabhuvu (allah)nu matrame aradhincali
varu akalito unnappudu ayane variki aharamiccadu mariyu ayane varini bhayam (pramadam) nundi kapadadu
tirpudinanni tiraskarince vyaktini nivu cusava
atade anathulanu kasari kottevadu
mariyu pedavallaku annam pettamani protsahincanivadu
kavuna namaj cese, (ituvanti) variki vinasam tappadu
evaraite tama namaj la patla asrad'dha vahistaro
evaraite pradarsanabud'dhito vyavaharistaro (namaj saluputaro)
mariyu (prajalaku) saman'ya upakaram (sahayam) kuda nirakaristaro
(o muham'mad!) Niscayanga, memu niku kausar prasadincamu
Kanuka nivu ni prabhuvu korake namaj ceyyi mariyu bali (khurbani) kuda (ayana korake) ivvu
niscayanga ni satruvu, vade! Veru tegina vadiga (varasudu, peru lekunda) ayipotadu
ila anu: "O satyatiraskarulara
miru aradhistunna vatini nenu aradhincanu
mariyu nenu aradhistunna ayananu (allah nu) miru aradhincevaru karu
mariyu miru aradhistunna vatini nenu aradhincevanni kanu
mariyu nenu aradhistunna ayananu miru aradhincevaru karu
mi dharmam miku mariyu na dharmam naku
(o muham'mad!) Eppudaite allah sahayam vastundo mariyu vijayam (labhistundo)
mariyu nivu prajalanu gumpulu gumpuluga allah dharmam (islam)lo pravesincadam custavo
appudu nivu ni prabhuvu stotranto patu ayana pavitratanu koniyadu mariyu ayana ksamabhiksanu arthincu. Niscayanga, ayane pascattapanni angikarincevadu
abu lahab rendu cetulu nasincugaka mariyu atadu kuda nasinci povu gaka
atadi dhanam mariyu atadi sampadana (santanam) atadiki e matram paniki ravu
atadu prajvalince narakagnilo kalcabadatadu
mariyu atadi bharya kuda! Kattelu mose (cadilu ceppi kalahalu rekettince) stri
ame medalo baga penini kharjurapunara tradu (masad) untundi
ila anu: "Ayane allah! Ekaikudu
allah! Evari akkara leni vadu
ayanaku santanam ledu (biddalanu kanadu) mariyu ayana kuda evari santanamu (evariki janmincina vadunu) kadu
mariyu (sarvalokalalo) ayanato polcadaginadi edi ledu
ila anu: "Nenu udaya kalapu prabhuvu ayina (allah) saranu vedukuntunnanu
ayana srstincina pratidani kidu nundi
mariyu cim'macikati kidu nundi, eppudaite adi kram'mukuntundo
mariyu mudula mida mantrinci ude vari kidu nundi
Mariyu asuyaparudi kidu nundi, eppudaite atadu asuyapadatado
ila anu: "Nenu manavula prabhuvu (allah) nu saranukai vedukuntunnanu
manavula sarvabhaumudu
manavula aradhyadaivam (ayina allah yokka saranu)
kalatalu rekettinci tolagipoyevani kidu nundi
evadaite manavula hrdayalalo kalatalu rekettistado
vadu jinnatulaloni vadu kavaccu leda manavulaloni vadu kavaccu
